title: Party Drone
detail: A drone that flies around via RC, listens to whatever music is playing, and pulses its lights to the beat
extended_details:
We want to create a remote-controlled drone that listens to music playing in its environment and reacts by pulsing its lights along to the beat. The drone will be controlled through wifi. There will be a microphone attached to the drone that will listen to music and the microcontroller will perform fast Fourier transforms to determine the bpm and signal the lights to flash accordingly.

ESP8266 ESP-12E Development Board WiFi WLAN Wireless Module
11.1V 3S 1500mAh Lipo Battery with XT60 Plug and Charger
iFlight SucceX-D F7 TwinG Dual ICM20689 Flight Controller F7
